titles: The Iesuits miracles, or new popish vvonders Containing the straw, the crowne, and the vvondrous child, with the confutation of them and their follies.
author: Pricket, Robert.
publisher: [By Nicholas Okes] for C. P[urset] and R. I[ackson] and are to be sold at his shop in Fleetstreet neere the Conduit,
notes: "To the reader" signed: R.P., i.e. Robert Pricket. Variant: "To the reader" unsigned.
Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Catholic Church --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
